title: Is there going to be another free document shredding event in Wilmington again any time soon.
text:
You
just missed one. The county safety fair also offered document
shredding on Nov. 16.

Here's a link to the New Hanover County Environmental Management
website: http://www.nhcgov.com/Environmental/Pages/default.aspx

You will find contact information and other information related to
your question there.
